P094715.project_name: National Biodiversity Mainstreaming and Institutional Consolidation Project

keywords.cdata: access to genetic resources, agriculture, alien species, biodiversity assessment, biodiversity assessments, biodiversity conservation, biodiversity conservation projects, biodiversity loss, biodiversity management, Biodiversity Monitoring, Biodiversity Policy, Biodiversity Project, biodiversity strategy, Biological Diversity, biotechnology, conservation activities, conservation of biological diversity, conservation policies, conservation strategy, deforestation, economic development, ecosystem, ecosystem health, ecosystem management, endangered species, endemic species, Environmental Assessment, Environmental Assessments, environmental health, forest, Forest Ecosystems, Forestry, forests, Fragmentation, genetic diversity, Global Environment, Global Environment Facility, habitats, international biodiversity, invasive species, land management, land reform, landmark, landraces, local biodiversity, loss of biodiversity, mammals, mitigation, National Biodiversity, National Forest Program, national forests, Natural Habitats, natural resource, natural resource management, natural resources, nature, Petroleum, plant species, poverty alleviation, protected areas, restoration, species, sustainable use of biodiversity, variety, Watershed, Watershed Management, watersheds, wealth

project_abstract.cdata: The development objective of the National Biodiversity Mainstreaming and Institutional Consolidation Project for Brazil is to promote mainstreaming of biodiversity at national level in key government and private sector planning strategies and practices; as well as consolidate and strengthen institutional capacity to produce and disseminate biodiversity information and concepts. The reallocation will allow the grant co-recipients to better align the activities envisioned within the scope of the project to the amount of available funding in order to continue carrying out project activities, accelerate disbursements, and achieve the project development objective. The changes will: 1) liquidate grant proceeds originally assigned to category six (unallocated) in the amount of USD 1,000,000; 2) increase grant proceeds under categories one, two and five; and 3) decrease grant proceeds under categories three and four.

P094715.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ES</LangCode><ProjectName>Proyecto nacional de integración de la biodiversidad y de consolidación institucional</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>El Proyecto nacional de integración de la biodiversidad y de consolidación institucional tiene como fin promover la integración de los principios de la biodiversidad en las principales estrategias y prácticas de planificación del sector privado y público, así como consolidar y fortalecer la capacidad de las instituciones para generar y divulgar información y conceptos relevantes sobre biodiversidad. El proyecto está diseñado para aumentar la participación en la integración de los principios de la biodiversidad en Brasil, así como incrementar la capacidad para efectuar dicha integración y el consenso en torno a ella. El proyecto abordará en primer lugar los sectores de la agricultura, la salud, la ciencia y tecnología, el medio ambiente, la silvicultura, la pesca y los recursos hídricos. Se espera que la energía, el transporte y la minería, entre otros sectores, pasen a formar parte del proyecto durante su ejecución.</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
